content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each question about conditionals.
content.explanation: Se usa 'will' en la primera condicional para situaciones reales en el futuro.
content.stimulus_en: If it rains tomorrow, we ___ stay at home.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each question about conditionals.
content.explanation: Se utiliza 'would' en la segunda condicional para situaciones hipotéticas.
content.stimulus_en: If I had a million dollars, I ___ travel the world.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each question about conditionals.
content.explanation: En este caso, 'will' se usa para acciones futuras que dependen de una condición.
content.stimulus_en: If I see her at the party, I ___ tell her the news.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each question about conditionals.
content.explanation: 'Would have' se utiliza para situaciones pasadas que no sucedieron.
content.stimulus_en: If he had known about the meeting, he ___ come.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct answer for each question about conditionals.
content.explanation: 'Will' indica una acción futura que ocurrirá si se cumple una condición.
content.stimulus_en: If you call me, I ___ help you with your homework.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete each sentence about relative clauses.
content.explanation: En este caso, 'that' se usa para definir el libro específico que me prestaste.
content.stimulus_en: The book ___ you lent me is fantastic.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete each sentence about relative clauses.
content.explanation: Aquí, 'who' se utiliza para añadir información sobre mi hermana.
content.stimulus_en: My sister, ___ is a doctor, lives in London.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete each sentence about relative clauses.
content.explanation: 'Where' se usa para indicar el lugar donde sucedió algo.
content.stimulus_en: The restaurant ___ we dined is famous for its pizza.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete each sentence about relative clauses.
content.explanation: 'When' se utiliza para definir un tiempo específico en una oración.
content.stimulus_en: I will never forget the day ___ we met.

content.prompt_es: Choose the correct option to complete each sentence about relative clauses.
content.explanation: 'That' se usa aquí para especificar las películas que quiero ver.
content.stimulus_en: There are many movies ___ I want to watch.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'which':
content.explanation: En esta oración, usamos 'which' para añadir información sobre el restaurante. Es una cláusula relativa que especifica cuál restaurante.
content.stimulus_en:
The restaurant is very popular. It is in the city center.

The restaurant, which... ...
content.correct_answer: is very popular, is in the city center.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'who':
content.explanation: Aquí usamos 'who' porque hablamos de una persona, y queremos añadir información sobre ella.
content.stimulus_en:
She is a doctor. She helps people.

She is a doctor who... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'that':
content.explanation: Utilizamos 'that' para dar más información sobre el museo, que es una cosa.
content.stimulus_en:
I visited the museum. It has ancient artifacts.

I visited the museum that... ...

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'which':
content.explanation: Aquí, 'which' añade información sobre el libro, indicando quién lo escribió.
content.stimulus_en:
The book is on the table. It is written by J.K. Rowling.

The book, which... ...
content.correct_answer: is written by J.K. Rowling, is on the table.

content.prompt_es: Reescribe la frase usando la palabra clave 'when':
content.explanation: Utilizamos 'when' para referirnos a un momento específico en el tiempo, que es el día.
content.stimulus_en:
I remember the day. We met on that day.

I remember the day when... ...
